title: “Small” Businesses, Down With VOD 4.29.20
itunes:title: “Small” Businesses, Down With VOD 4.29.20
description:
In episode 619, Jack and Miles are joined by Ethnically Ambiguous co-host Shereen Younes to discuss PPP going to the wrong companies, the Kentucky governor's latest faux pas, a round up of Trump flubs, Trolls World Tour killing it on video on demand, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Multi-millionaire Trump donor is top recipient of funds intended for struggling small businesses
  2. Dallas Hotel Owner Is Biggest Beneficiary of Coronavirus Loan Program
  3. What’s Wrong With America?
  4. Kentucky governor apologizes after accusing resident named Tupac Shakur of unemployment prank
  5. Trump to Order U.S. Meat Plants to Stay Open Amid Pandemic
  6. Trump Claims His ‘Talent’ Or ‘Luck’ Saved Lives As COVID-19 Death Toll Approaches 60K
  7. Three weeks of Trump coronavirus briefings under a microscope: 2 hours spent on attacks, 45 minutes on self-congratulation — and 4½ minutes of condolences for victims
  8. President's intelligence briefing book repeatedly cited virus threat
  9. ‘Trolls World Tour’: Universal PVOD Experiment Racks Up Near Estimated $100M To Date
  10. WATCH: Childish Gambino - Time (Audio) ft. Ariana Grande

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
